title: MicroStrategy’s MSTR shares rally, earns spot among top 500 US companies
description:
MicroStrategy has surged into the elite ranks of the top 500 US companies by market capitalization, riding a recent bullish wave in its stock performance. Data reveals a remarkable ascent for MicroStrategy, climbing 46 places in just one day to secure the 427th spot among America’s largest publicly traded firms as of Feb. 29. This […]

title: Canada Witnesses Surge in AI-Driven Fraud Attempts
description: A new poll conducted during RBC’s Fraud Prevention Month has highlighted a growing concern among Canadians regarding the escalation of AI-driven fraud attempts, particularly those powered by artificial intelligence (AI) technologies like deepfakes and voice cloning. title: Crypto markets on high FOMO alert – Here’s what’s happening
description: The crypto markets are currently experiencing heightened levels of FOMO (Fear of Missing Out), leading to significant volatility and speculative trading activity. FOMO in crypto refers to the fear investors feel when they perceive they are missing out on potential profits. title: BlackRock to launch Bitcoin ETF in Brazil
description: BlackRock unveiled its partnership with Brazil's B3 stock exchange to launch the iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF's Brazilian Depositary Receipts on Thursday.
